item.description:
Lowell Devils vs Providence Bruins

Come see the future stars of the NHL!! The NHL's junior teams are always fun and exciting to watch and last year the Providence Bruins finished at the top of their division.

Doors open at 6:00 pm and the game is scheduled to start at 7:00 pm. We are getting a group rate of $13.00, that's $5.00 off the individual ticket price!! I have to charge $13.70 for each ticket because there is a 70 cent processing fee for each ticket.

I am going to have to purchase the tickets when I reserve the seats, therefore I can't accept any "maybes" for this event. Sorry!!!

All ticket will be placed in "Will Call" under each individual name. We will meet near the "Will Call" window at 5:45 pm, so that we can socialize and get to know each other a little better before we head into the arena. Hope to see you all there!!

http://www.paultsonga...

http://lowelldevilsho...

http://www.providence...
item.how_to_find_us: Near the Will Call window - look for the TFS sign
item.name: Hockey - L. Devils vs P. Bruins
